recipes.title: Spaghetti and Meatballs
recipes.Ingredients: Spaghetti Noodles, Cheese, Tomato Sauce, Ground Beef/Turkey, Salt, Pepper, Garlic, Oregano
recipes.Recipe: Boil noodles for 15 minutes. Drain noodles. Mix spices and ground meat. Roll into balls and bake meat in oven for 15 minutes

recipes.title: Chicken Friend Rice
recipes.Ingredients: White Rice, Egg, Soy Sauce, Carrots, Peas, Chicken
recipes.Recipe: Use premade white rice for best results. Cook chicken in pan. Scramble egg and combine with chicken and vegetables. Add in the rice and soy sauce

recipes.title: Bean Burrito
recipes.Recipe: Cook ground meat and beans. Place meat and beans in a tortilla. Wrap and eat

recipes.title: Salmon and Rice
recipes.Ingredients: Salmon, Rice of choice, Salt, Pepper, Garlic powder
recipes.Recipe: Cook rice and set aside. Cook salmon in skillet and season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Plate and eat

recipes.title: Hamburger
recipes.Recipe: Shape ground meat into burger patty. Cook on stove for 6 minutes on each side. Plate with garnishes of choice

recipes.title: French Onion Soup
recipes.Ingredients: Cheese, Onion, Beef Broth, Bread, Oil
recipes.Recipe: Mix onions and oil until onions are soft. Add broth and cheeses
